CEB Advisory: Ongoing re-accommodation of passengers on diverted Dubai-Manila flight 5J 015.As of July 3, 2016; 11:00AM (Philippine time; GMT+8).Cebu Pacific flight 5J015 Dubai – Manila undertook a precautionary diversion to the Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport in Mumbai, India at 10:40AM on June 29, 2016 due to a technical requirement of the assigned aircraft.ll passengers of 5J015 have been re-accommodated on other airlines, and are expected to arrive in Manila today. While in Mumbai, passengers were provided hotel accommodation, meals, and transfers, as CEB finalized the onward travel for each passenger. CEB’s Customer Care team is also reaching out directly to all affected passengers to provide further support, and to address any concerns they may have even after their arrival in Manila. The aircraft that diverted to Mumbai was a two-year-old Airbus A330. CEB is in discussion with Airbus and Rolls Royce, the engine manufacturer, and the aircraft will undergo thorough maintenance inspection prior to re-entering service. We sincerely regret the inconvenience the diversion has caused our passengers, and hope for their understanding as safety remains our priority.
